title: Knitting course
text: Learn to knit and explore creative techniques to knit unique garments.

title: Leather craft course
text: Learn the essential tricks and techniques of working with leather.

title: Pottery course
text: Craft unique and organic ceramics using simple pottery methods.

title: Jewelry course
text: Learn decorative techniques for creating a unique collection of jewelry.

title: Sewing course
text: Learn how to use a sewing machine and start creating unique outfits from scratch.
